name: Terrorblade
title: Demon Marauder
lore: A demon so twisted even his own kind imprisoned him, Terrorblade commands illusions and reflects damage.

reflection.name: Reflection
reflection.description: Creates invulnerable illusions of all nearby enemies that attack them.

conjureImage.name: Conjure Image
conjureImage.description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals moderate damage.

metamorphosis.name: Metamorphosis
metamorphosis.description: Terrorblade transforms into a ranged demon with bonus damage.

sunder.name: Sunder
sunder.description: Swaps health percentages with a target enemy or ally.
